script:
1). So that will be three soups to start with please and one fruit juice.
I'd like to have something hot today as it's so cold.
Thank you, sir. And what about drinks for you all? 
There don't seem to be many people here today.
2). Has everyone decided what they'd like for their main dish?
We probably need a few more minutes to make our minds up. 
I really don't think we want to eat any chips today.
You can never tell whether it's a good idea to book or not.
3). Are you sitting in a draught where you are?
I think someone should open that window.
No. it's nice and warm where I am. 
I'm finding it difficult to read this menu.
